title: Discarded PPE filling up landfills and oceans
description: In the early days of the Covid-19 pandemic, the shortage of PPE left many frontline healthcare workers painfully vulnerable. Now, the sudden mass production of PPE is adding to an already staggering amount of plastic waste in our landfills and oceans. CNN's Bill Weir reports.

title: 'Get a little uncomfortable': See Brooke Baldwin's last words on air
description: Brooke Baldwin bids farewell to the "Newsroom" audience and her CNN family after being with company for more than 10 years.

title: This ultra-white paint could cool buildings, cutting the need for air conditioning
description: Scientists have developed a light-reflecting "ultra-white" paint, which they say could negate the need for air conditioning and even reduce carbon emissions, if used on a mass scale.

title: Watch military flyover interrupt a White House briefing
description: The military flyover, scheduled as part of the dedication of a new World War I memorial, was heard throughout Washington, DC.

title: Taylor Swift surprises nurse with handwritten note
description: Nurse Britta Thomason received a surprise care package and handwritten note from Taylor Swift after she mentioned being a fan of the pop star in an interview with her local paper.

title: This $800 million whistleblower program is losing its top cop
description: The head of the Securities and Exchange Commission's highly-successful whistleblower program is stepping down at a delicate moment for the market watchdog.

title: This vacation hotspot is offering vaccinations to visitors
description: It was one of the first countries to fully reopen to travelers, and now Maldives is striving to be ahead of the game when it comes to vaccine tourism.

title: Here's why this river turned white
description: Photos and videos of the River Dulais in Wales show its water turned white on April 14.

title: 'Stinging rebuke': Clapper reacts to Biden's sanctions on Russia
description: Former US Director of National Intelligence, James Clapper, explains to CNN's Jim Sciutto why President Biden's sanctions against Russia are significant.

title: 'Medical marvel' Mom got pregnant while already pregnant
description: British mom Rebecca Roberts shares her story of giving birth to twins she conceived three weeks apart, a rare condition called superfetation. CNN's Elizabeth Cohen has the details.

title: The postcard that came home after 60 years
description: It was 2003, and Leora Krygier was rummaging around a thrift store near her home in Los Angeles.

title: This tech could help clean the air for commuters
description: Amid the pandemic, public transport providers are trying to keep commuters safe from Covid. One firm taking on that challenge is AirLabs. Its new AiroSafe tech can be fitted to seats on buses, trains or subways to filter airborne coronavirus and pollutants.

title: Conservative televangelist Pat Robertson lashes out at police
description: CNN's Don Lemon plays the clip of televangelist Pat Robertson giving tough criticism of police officers for violence against Black Americans.

title: Wild video catches SUV jumping drawbridge
description: Surveillance video shows a driver crashing through two traffic arms and jumping a rising drawbridge in Daytona Beach, Florida.
